alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 6:19PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Buffalo and Sherman Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 619 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ansley, or 18 miles southeast of Broken Bow, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Litchfield around 635 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hazard, Ravenna and Rockville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central and central Nebraska.
